title: Design Thinking-Based Engineering Competency Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering knowledge and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Online learning environment combining team-based projects with individual reflection

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more creative problem-solving solutions using the design thinking process.
Learners can apply five or more effective communication strategies during team collaboration.
Learners can accurately diagnose their individual competency development levels with over 80% precision using self-assessment tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
